title: Mission-Critical Lessons On Apollo 11’s 50th Anniversary
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: As the moon landing was to America, so too is the giant leap of retirement readiness that occurs through the small steps of your clients. This podcast (5:53) argues that small efforts continue to appear small even at intermediate stages, but lead to mathematically demonstrable large-scale accomplishments if we persist in them. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
